titles.title: A bill to enroll 20 individuals under the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 10/5/1988--Introduced. Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Interior to enroll certain individuals as Natives under the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act and entitles such individuals to receive shares of stock in the Kenai Natives Association and Cook Inlet Region, Incorporated.
